description:
Masaomi`s Nageki participated in the Don George Donamite Tournament. After seeing Stephan`s Sawk for the first time, it was quite evident that its attitude towards it was that it wanted to prove to it that it was superior. As it walked by, Masaomi`s Nageki purposely hit Stephan`s Sawk shoulder to try to intimidate it into a fight but Stephan`s Sawk showed its composure and did not engage it in battle.
Donamite Tournament
In the first round of the Donamite Tournament, Masaomi`s Nageki faced Domon`s Mienshao. It showed its incredible strength by using a three move combo: Superpower, Seismic Toss and the finishing move Circle Throw. Domon`s Mienshao was knocked out before it was even able to land a successful blow. With the win, Masaomi advanced to the second round while Domon was eliminated from the tournament.
name: Nageki (Masaomi)
